func_sig.description: Evaluate and solve mathematical expressions or problems using sympy for symbolic computation.
func_sig.name: evaluate_math_problem

problem_statement.description: The mathematical problem statement to be solved.

func_sig.description: Solve mathematical problems using sympy for symbolic computation, especially for mathematical expressions.
func_sig.name: solve_math_problem

equations.description: An array of mathematical expressions or equations to be solved.

variables.description: An array of variables involved in the equations.
